Reviews.Title: Buy it for the lens
Reviews.Author: sixstringstrummer
Reviews.Content: The megapixels don't matter. A 3 megapixel is good for an 8x10 for the average snap-and-shooter. What makes a good camera is good software and a good lens. This camera has a 5x Schneider-Kreuznach Variogon optical zoom lens. This company has been making lenses for a long time and know what they are doing. A nice big 3" view finder makes it really easy to see what you're getting. All this for less than $100. This is a great camera for archiving your memories. The only thing I would do is change from 14mp to 3-6mp. The files will take up a lot less room and like I said at the beginning, for the average point-and-shooter you don't need more than 3.

Reviews.Title: Great Price and functions!
Reviews.Author: EDUARDO E SCHROEDER FDEZ
Reviews.Content: Excelent price for the options you get, a similar camare from other brand at least 50% higher price. I would recommend it for sure

Reviews.Title: Gift for Grandson
Reviews.Author: Padrac O'toole
Reviews.Content: My 10 year old grandson requested this particular camera for his birthday.  His cousin has one and he was impressed with hers.  He loves it and has had no trouble using it. I gave it 4 stars since I have not used it and he lives out of state. He would have given it 5 stars I am sure. My experience with many items I have purchased through Amazon has been very good and I give Amazon 5 stars.

ProductInfo.Features:
14-megapixel resolution for stunning prints up to 30 x 40 inches
5x optical zoom; 28 mm wide-angle lens
3-inch LCD with KODAK Color Science Technology
Kodak's Smart Capture feature
Capture images to SD/SDHC memory cards (not included)
ProductInfo.Name: Kodak Easyshare M575 14 MP Digital Camera with 5x Wide Angle Optical Zoom and 3.0-Inch LCD (Forest Green)
